snippet.textDisplay:
No one is entitled to an award. If the work isn't good, it isn't period. The fact is white people are more involved in the film industry, if you want to see actual change, get involved and stop complaining.
Oh and I would not take Perry's opinion too seriously, he's the fashion nova of television/movie. It's a sign of societal progress when you thing about it, we now allow minorities to become incredibly rich while being minimally talented. So that's good :)

snippet.textDisplay: It's called tokenism. Being given a gift/award to shut you up. I saw a movie a few years back starring an old white actor(i forgot his name) because of the numerous awards he had received, so i was excited to watch. To say that that was one of the most boring movie i ever watched would be an understatement. I hated the plot too. Din't make sense. Kept wondering what all the awards were for. So yeah, there is the lack of diversity. But do some of these actors or movies that are snubbed also good? I would hate to blame all the snubbing on race if some of them really suck.

snippet.textDisplay:
There we have it... gender, race, minorities, these are all important things to be talked about and there are real issues in US society that need to be fixed.
However, people shouldn’t just be given a trophy for being part of a minority. If your performance isn‘t Oscar-worthy that‘s just how it is.
snippet.textOriginal:
There we have it... gender, race, minorities, these are all important things to be talked about and there are real issues in US society that need to be fixed. 
However, people shouldn’t just be given a trophy for being part of a minority. If your performance isn‘t Oscar-worthy that‘s just how it is.

snippet.textDisplay:
Lmao!
Sometimes I think that my people (black) are truly as dumb as the world thinks we are! How long are we gonna beg at the feet of white society?! So...Tyler can build a studio that's bigger than all of the other studios combined. And we also have more millionaires than ever before. If we made the black award shows more of a priority than any other award show, then we wouldn't be having this discussion! Have you ever heard of a white actor complain about NOT getting a BET or NAACP award?? Nope.

snippet.textDisplay:
I’ve got a solution. Maybe um....... dO bEtTeR?!

Lack of diversity, but plenty of women have been nominated. J Lo from an acting perspective, wasn’t even close to the performance that Scarlet Johansson or Renee Zellweger put on. If you want it to be more diverse, dont go for a star studded movie that had the plot of every other movie out there, and don’t co Star with Lizzo or Cardi B. That’s just the director basically saying, “hey look, the plots not here but we’ve got your favs!”

Besides, the Academy has increased the numer of POC and women to about half od the voters . So.. why is it back to being all white? snippet.authorDisplayName: The Talk into the Mike Show
snippet.textDisplay: Expecting equality from mediocrity, you would rather destroy things you do not accept. The only way to appease everyone is for no more award shows at all. No Grammys, no Oscars, nothing.  Face it, this year didn't have movies good enough for Oscars that didn't have predominantly white actors. That's the truth.
snippet.textOriginal: Expecting equality from mediocrity, you would rather destroy things you do not accept. The only way to appease everyone is for no more award shows at all. No Grammys, no Oscars, nothing.  Face it, this year didn't have movies good enough for Oscars that didn't have predominantly white actors. That's the truth.

snippet.textDisplay: Though  there were good movies  that did not get nominated. There was a great selection. You should not be judged on  gender or color.  Performance  should be the key. snippet.textDisplay: i just think the fault here is not of the academy per se but the actual nominations...they really should expand the categories to atleast 8 or 9 nominees per category because we are living in this golden age of cinema and more and more diversity is shown in movies.....and lets be real 5 nominees worked when it was 1990s and 2000s but in the last decade hollywood has become crazy diverse and all of those talented actors and directors are doing jobs equal to their white counterparts and so while 5 white nominees seemed enough for 90s and 2000s era,today it just doesnt cut it because there are so much good work from other people group as well who are telling stories for a POC point of view and those performances need to be acknowledged too....
snippet.textOriginal: i just think the fault here is not of the academy per se but the actual nominations...they really should expand the categories to atleast 8 or 9 nominees per category because we are living in this golden age of cinema and more and more diversity is shown in movies.....and lets be real 5 nominees worked when it was 1990s and 2000s but in the last decade hollywood has become crazy diverse and all of those talented actors and directors are doing jobs equal to their white counterparts and so while 5 white nominees seemed enough for 90s and 2000s era,today it just doesnt cut it because there are so much good work from other people group as well who are telling stories for a POC point of view and those performances need to be acknowledged too....

snippet.textDisplay: Americans please take a chill pill. there is so much diversity in that nominations list, no one is just talking about it because the spotlight is on Asia this time and I don't mean 'Asian-Americans'. The Oscars honor the best in movies from all over the world, not just America. So get over yourselves. Besides instead of just pining after the fact that there were no women, make a list of your own recognitions because to me, unless I am just unaware I can't think of any female made movies that can take the place of any one of those movies nominated!!!!!
snippet.textOriginal: Americans please take a chill pill. there is so much diversity in that nominations list, no one is just talking about it because the spotlight is on Asia this time and I don't mean 'Asian-Americans'. The Oscars honor the best in movies from all over the world, not just America. So get over yourselves. Besides instead of just pining after the fact that there were no women, make a list of your own recognitions because to me, unless I am just unaware I can't think of any female made movies that can take the place of any one of those movies nominated!!!!!

snippet.textDisplay:
Oscar’s is not made for everyone.

Be real about it all.
snippet.textOriginal:
Oscar’s is not made for everyone.

Be real about it all.

snippet.textDisplay:
Do you feel down, sad, depressed? Is there something in your life right  now, or in your past  you are guilty of?

Are there big burdens on your mind that are weighing you down?
You don't  have it all or you have  it but you  you feel like something is missing?

I have good news to share. There is someone who cares about you. There is someone out there who loves you so much.  He loves you so much he sent his son to die for you. He is been waiting all this while for you to turn to him

He can give you joy, peace life, and everything you need. He will carry your burdens, worry and take care of tomorrow for you.

He came to die for your sins so that you may have life  abundant. His name is Jesus
 
I would like to tell you about this friend. He is the best friend you could ever wish for; His name is Jesus.

Jesus loves you and He proved His love when He gave His life for you on the cross.
He paid the penalty of your sins so that with your repentance and faith He can be your friend.
He promises to be your friend for ever. In
Hebrews 13 v 5, His promise to us is; “I will never to leave you nor forsake you.” If you take the Lord Jesus as your Saviour today you will never regret it, He will give you a new life, a new purpose and a new future.

He will walk with you through life’s changing scenes.
Will you accept him into your life

Close your eyes and say this with me

Say jesus. Thank you for coming to die for my sins. Please come into my heart.  I repent of all my sins. Forgive me and make me new and whole again. Thank you jesus. In jesus name we pray. Amen.

Pls look for a bible believing Church in your area. And attend and talk to them

Wishing you a much happier and joyful life
.

snippet.textDisplay: Parasite was an amazing movie and I'm sad that the panel didn't touch on the fact that it's also a Korean foreign film nominated in the main categories. Let's not overshadow diversity in other areas as well. Advocate for diversity but also recognize when diversity is breaking boundaries. Dont be too blindsided by one that you can't praise or acknowledge the other.
